activities: Accuity Inc. receives from its customers and its affiliates’ customers their clients' personal information to provide interdiction screening against the U.S. Treasury's OFAC list and other sanctions and due diligence lists to support such customers’ compliance with anti-money laundering (AML), know your customer (KYC) and sanctions requirements. When performing this interdiction list screening and related customer support activities, including technical support, Accuity Inc. is receiving and processing the personal information under the direction of the customers. Accuity Inc. also receives and processes personal information pertaining to its customers and its affiliates’ customers’ personnel to provide and improve its services, license administration, customer support and marketing activities
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed customer and client data
